blogPosts.title: Thank you Delivery Workers!

blogPosts.title: The Importance of Mental Health During this Crisis
blogPosts.summary: Now, more than ever, we must be careful of our mental health, and take care of those around us. These trying times require everyone to be supportive and take care of themselves!

text_1: There is no doubt that COVID-19 has significantly impacted peopleâ€™s lives around the world in various ways. As many countries are currently battling against this virus, there is constant media coverage surrounding developments of this pandemic. People are constantly exposed to news and information regarding the spread of COVID-19. It is everywhere; on social media, television and even in our everyday conversations.

Given these circumstances, it is very normal to feel overwhelmed. It is also understandable that during extremely stressful times like this, people may often experience negative emotions such as fear and anxiety. Thus, it is especially important to take care of your mental health at a time like this.
If you are struggling to cope or experiencing an increase in feelings of fear and anxiety, here are some things you can do to keep your mental wellbeing in check:
ulist_1: Manage your exposure to news and media coverage.
Be mindful of sources of information and only view those that are credible and accurate.
Remain calm, stay positive and adjust your mindset.
Strictly follow the directives issued by the government so you feel good about doing your part.
It is important to stay connected with friends and family as well as create a supportive community for each other.
text_2: We want to remind everyone that support services are only a phone call away. We encourage you to utilise these available services as talking to someone about your feelings can take some weight off your shoulders. If you know someone who can benefit from these services, please share this post with them.

COVID-19-AU is not only a website that provides live updates and accurate information obtained from official Government websites but also a supportive community where we hope to spread positivity to help everyone get through this extremely challenging time.
Remember, you are not alone. We are all in this together. We are always here for you. Please stay safe and take good care of yourself. ğŸ’™

blogPosts.title: Stay at home this Easter! ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‰
blogPosts.summary: Make sure you stay at home this easter, or else Zipper, the Easter bunny will make all your ressources be eggs!

text_1: In these trying times, Easter seems to be the best reason to leave the house and enjoy a drink and a meal with friends and family, but now, more than ever, it is important that we stay at home and stay safe.
Here are some important tips for this Easter:
olist_1:
Only leave home if essential ğŸ 
Visiting friends and having gatherings is still considered non-essential, and can get you heavy fines in some states. Only leave the home if you need to buy groceries for Easter lunch or other meals, to stretch your legs or to go to work!

No picnics or gatherings ğŸ›£
Parks and reserves are always the perfect places to spend Easter with your friends and family, but not this Easter. Stay in the safe space of your own home and avoid contracting Covid-19 or receiving heavy fines.

Keep in touch online ğŸ“±ğŸ’»
Zoom, Facebook Messenger, Skype and many more other services are brilliant ways to keep in touch with your loved ones this Easter. Have the usual laughs and chats with your friends and family online, within the safety of your own home. Quarantines doesnâ€™t mean you canâ€™t have fun with them!

Enjoy time with your immediate familyğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦
Grab your partner, parents or siblings and cherish this time with them. Easter is all about spending time with your loved ones, and now is more important than ever to remain strong together and spread the love!
text_2: We hope everyone has a safe and happy Easter!! â¤ï¸ğŸ’›ğŸ’™
